info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 17 at 11:44AM CDT until August 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cedar River near Lansing affecting Mower County.
Cedar River at Austin affecting Mower County.
.Rainfall amounts Saturday night into Sunday morning were in the 3 to 5 inch range, with amounts in the City of Austin around 1 to 2 inches. This precipitation is expected to route into area waterways and bring the Cedar River above flood stage. These forecasts include an additional 0.5 to 0.75 inches of precipitation expected Sunday night into Monday morning. If additional precipitation amounts exceed these amounts, the river may rise above the current forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cedar River near Lansing.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow evening.
* IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 19.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued late tonight by midnight CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING
